title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ken Cuccinelli & Asra Nomani | 7/23/20
description:
Acting DHS Deputy Secretary Ken Cuccinelli came prepared to turn the media narrative about federal officers in Portland on its head. He also explains why China’s Houston consulate was so abruptly shut down. Glenn’s nine-year-old prediction is now fulfilled: Radicals, Islamists, communists, and anarchists are working together and using the Black Lives Matter movement to dismantle the West. The radicals of the 1960s and 1970s are training the radicals of today and forming a “Red-Green Alliance” with the Palestinian movement. Former Wall Street Journal reporter Asra Nomani exposes the virus of woke Islamism.
